goal.en:
1. to build the fundamental abilities of measurement and data analysis
2. to cultivate the abilities of logical deduction and report-writing
3. to experience the processes and methods about experimental verification
goal.ch:
1. 建立量測與數據處理的基本能力
2. 培養邏輯推演與報告撰寫的能力
3. 體驗實驗驗證的過程與方法

content.en:
experiments as below:
1. Oscilloscope and Multimeter
2. RC circuit
3. Electro-magnetic Induction
4. Michaelson Interference and simple components
5. Atomic spectrum and Plank‘s constant
content.ch:
1.示波器 and 三用電表
2.RC電路
3.電磁力與電磁感應
4.邁克森干涉與光學
5.原子光譜與蒲朗克常數

grading.en: Q ＆ A : 15％ Quiz : 15％ Preview report : 20％ Lab report : 30％ Final exam (writing ＆ doing): 20％
grading.ch: 平時(含課堂問答)15％ 小考：15％ 實驗預習報告：20％ 實驗報告：30％ 期末考(試卷+實作)：20％
